server

Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameServer

    @ApplicationScoped
public class GameServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameServer
    Klasa do obslugi listy gier/Game list support class.
    Since:
    2019-01-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Piotr Podg√≥rski

      java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      Zwraca liste graczy, na potrzeby javascript, zawsze dodawani sa dwaj gracze niewidoczni, tak aby JavaScrit zawsza widzial obiekt jako liste obiektow gracz/ Returns the list of players, for the purposes of javascript, there are always added two players invisible, so that JavaScrit will always see the object as a list of player objects.

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
        Zwraca liste graczy, na potrzeby javascript, zawsze dodawani sa dwaj gracze niewidoczni, tak aby JavaScrit zawsza widzial obiekt jako liste obiektow gracz/ Returns the list of players, for the purposes of javascript, there are always added two players invisible, so that JavaScrit will always see the object as a list of player objects.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        lista graczy/list of players
